movie.title: Sleeping with the Enemy
movie.description_intro: Laura and Martin have been married for four years. They seem to be the perfect, happiest and most successful couple. The reality of their house- hold, however, is very different. Martin is an abusive and brutally obsessed husband. Laura is living her life in constant fear and waits for a chance to escape. She finally stages her own death, and flees to a new town and new identity. But when Martin finds out that his wife is not dead he will stop at nothing to find and kill her.
movie.description_full: Laura and Martin have been married for four years. They seem to be the perfect, happiest and most successful couple. The reality of their house- hold, however, is very different. Martin is an abusive and brutally obsessed husband. Laura is living her life in constant fear and waits for a chance to escape. She finally stages her own death, and flees to a new town and new identity. But when Martin finds out that his wife is not dead he will stop at nothing to find and kill her.

movies.title: Spellbinder
movies.summary: Across a dark street in Los Angeles, a beautiful young woman is being brutally assaulted by an abusive boyfriend. Young lawyer Jeff Mills rushes to the woman's defense - and crosses into a world of unimaginable evil. On the surface, the young woman, Miranda Reed, is a dream come true, the perfect lover, a miracle healer and a soulmate. Before two days have passed, Jeff lives a real-life nightmare, an encounter so intense, death is almost merciful. Because Jeff learns that Miranda is a fugitive from the witches coven (to which she belongs) and they want her back. Back in time for a human sacrifice by the Unholy Night of the Winter Solstice.

movies.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
movies.summary: A disillusioned war veteran, Captain Rannulph Junuh, reluctantly agrees to play a game of golf. He finds the game futile until his caddy, Bagger Vance, teaches him the secret of the authentic golf stroke which turns out also to be the secret to mastering any challenge and finding meaning in life.

movies.title: Lady Ice
movies.summary: An insurance investigator romances a wealthy young beauty when he suspects she may be involved in fencing stolen jewels.
movies.description_full: An insurance investigator romances a wealthy young beauty when he suspects she may be involved in fencing stolen jewels.
movies.synopsis: An insurance investigator romances a wealthy young beauty when he suspects she may be involved in fencing stolen jewels.

movies.title: Superman: Man of Tomorrow
movies.summary: It's the dawn of a new age of heroes, and Metropolis has just met its first. But as Daily Planet intern Clark Kent working alongside reporter Lois Lane secretly wields his alien powers of flight, super-strength and x-ray vision in the battle for good, there's even greater trouble on the horizon.
